pages.text: The $(item)Zorra Altar$() is used to apply or upgrade enchantments on $(thing)Zorrasteel tools$(), at the cost of experience and $(item)Zorra Leaves$().$(br2)Putting a $(thing)Zorrasteel tool$() in it will give you 3 options to choose from as well as their cost.

The top most slot will always be a new enchantment to apply (if possible).$(br)The middle one is always an upgrade to an existing enchantment (if possible).$(br)The bottom most one can be either and comes with a big experience discount, but you cannot see what it will apply until you get it.$(br2)Just like normal enchanting, all options change every time you enchant something.
With enough experience, $(thing)Zorrasteel tools$() can receive enchantments that far surpasses what standard tools can reach, although the price will start to accumulate quickly.
